Temari punches the opponent into the air, and Shikamaru connects with a kick. Then Shikamaru uses his [[Shadow Imitation Technique]] to paralyse the opponent. Then he throws [[kunai]] with attached [[explosive tag]]s while Temari uses her [[Sickle Weasel Technique]] to put the opponent in a tornado and slash them with the kunai while they explode with the explosive tags.

[[es:Explosión Hoz Comadreja]]
[[pl:Eksplozja Sierpu Łasicy]]
[[pt-br:Explosão da Foice da Doninha]]
